plot outline: Shareef Gujjar and Bhola are best friend,Shareef is a rustic and charming person while Bhola is a loud, thoughtless buffoon.He has infatuation with a local prostitute Nirma.She is saved from the life of a prostitute by Bhola,with the help of his friend Shareef,who is then framed by the police and imprisoned.
title: Badmash Gujjar
plot: Shareef Gujjar and Bhola are best friend,Shareef is a rustic and charming person while Bhola is a loud, thoughtless buffoon.He has infatuation with a local prostitute Nirma.She is saved from the life of a prostitute by Bhola,with the help of his friend Shareef,who is then framed by the police and imprisoned.
